Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class GameSelectionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GameSelectionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameHandlingListener, Listener, StateListener, UI
public class GameSelectionController extends GUIController implements StateListener, GameHandlingListener
A scene controller. It manages available games and lets users create or join a certain game.
